channel.title: PGP signed donation addresses
channel.description:
I noticed that the various donation addresses listed [here](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate) are not pgp signed by @patrick. IMHO, it would be good practice to have these in a pgp signed file linked from that page to authenticate.
Qubes does it in their [security pack](https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-secpack/tree/master/fund).
Thanks for reading. :slight_smile:
